Title: Relates to removing the social security offset for New York city uniformed correction officers who are members of the New York city uniformed correction/sanitation revised plan
Summary: Relates to removing the social security offset for New York city uniformed correction officers who are members of the New York city uniformed correction/sanitation revised plan.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to removing the social security offset for New York city uniformed correction officers who are members of the New York city uniformed correction/sanitation revised plan
